documentation.metadescription: KoolForm is a great form manager which can help you to unload tasks when deal with form. First, it helps you to style/skin your form so that your form appears consistent in all browsers. KoolForm also provides advanced controls such as textbox, button, dropdown, validator so that you can save huge amount of time for your important matters. KoolForm can be integrated seamlessly into your page without any changes to your existing page's layout.

property.name: id
property.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var radioYes = myform_manager.get_control("radioYes");
		alert(radioYes.id);//output "radioYes"
    }
</script>

method.name: select
method.shortdesc: Select or unselect the radio button.
method.longdesc: Select or unselect the radio button.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var radioYes = myform_manager.get_control("radioYes");
		radioYes.select(true);//Select the radioYes.
    }
</script>

method.name: is_selected
method.shortdesc: Return whether the radio button is selected.
method.longdesc: Return whether the radio button is selected.
method.samplecode:
<script type="text/javascript">
    function foo()
    {
		var radioYes = myform_manager.get_control("radioYes");
		alert(radioYes.is_selected());
    }
</script>
